title: Flutter Project Setup Checklist
summary: Install Flutter SDK, set up tooling, and verify the doctor report.
content: Walks through installing the Flutter SDK, configuring IDE plugins, accepting licenses, setting up desktop targets, and running flutter doctor to verify the environment. Includes CI setup tips.

title: Flutter Widget Fundamentals
summary: Core widget concepts including composition, layout, and rebuild behavior.
content: Explains StatelessWidget vs StatefulWidget, build method idempotency, layout widgets, constraints, and debugging rebuilds with debugPrintRebuildDirtyWidgets.

title: Material 3 Theming
summary: How to apply Material 3 color schemes, typography, and component themes.
content: Covers ColorScheme generators, dynamic color from platform, custom typography, component theming, and migrating from Material 2 settings.

title: Localization and Internationalization
summary: Add localization delegates, handle pluralization, and test RTL layouts.
content: Demonstrates using flutter_localizations, generating arb files, plural formatting, supporting right-to-left languages, and testing locale changes.

title: Accessibility Checklist
summary: Ensure Flutter apps are accessible with semantics, labels, and focus order.
content: Discusses Semantics widgets, large fonts, contrast, TalkBack/VoiceOver testing, focus traversal, and keyboard navigation for desktop targets.

title: Firebase Email/Password Authentication
summary: Step-by-step guidance for configuring Firebase email/password auth in Flutter.
content: Configure Firebase Authentication by enabling the email/password provider, adding firebase_auth to pubspec.yaml, initializing Firebase in main(), and wiring a ChangeNotifier to manage login state. Includes production tips for secure token refresh.

title: Firebase Multi-factor Authentication
summary: How to add multi-factor authentication with SMS and TOTP to a Flutter app.
content: Explains enrolling second factors using the Firebase Admin SDK, verifying OTP codes from SMS, and upgrading sessions with multiFactor.getSession(). Covers fallbacks and testing guidance for emulator-based verification.

title: Supabase Authentication Cookbook
summary: Supabase auth with RLS policies, magic links, OAuth providers, and deep links.
content: Details configuring Row Level Security policies, using supabase_flutter for session persistence, and enabling passwordless login via magic links. Includes troubleshooting for refresh tokens and realtime listeners.

title: Provider State Management Patterns
summary: Core provider patterns including ChangeNotifierProvider, Consumer, and performance tips.
content: Walkthrough of ChangeNotifier, ProviderScope best practices, and splitting widgets to avoid unnecessary rebuilds. Covers testing strategies and migrating from setState to provider for scalability.

title: Building Apps with Bloc
summary: Bloc architecture with events, states, and testing guidance for Flutter apps.
content: Introduces BlocProvider, BlocBuilder, event transformers, hydration, and integration with Navigator 2. Demonstrates migrating complex forms to bloc and adding unit tests with blocTest.

title: Navigator 2 Declarative Routing
summary: Using Router and RouteInformationParser to build declarative navigation.
content: Shows how to implement RouterDelegate, parse RouteInformation, sync browser history, and manage deep links. Includes patterns for nested navigation and state restoration for web.

title: GoRouter Cookbook
summary: GoRouter recipes for nested navigation, async redirects, and deep linking.
content: Provides practical GoRouter examples covering shell routes, query parameters, Hero transitions, and guard patterns. Highlights migration steps from Navigator 1.x.

title: Flutter Testing Strategies
summary: Widget, integration, and golden testing guidance for production apps.
content: Compares unit, widget, and integration tests. Includes golden test setup with flutter_test, fakes for platform channels, network image mocking, and CI tips for vendor-agnostic pipelines.

title: Performance Profiling Checklist
summary: Profile Flutter apps with DevTools, tracing, and shader compilation guidance.
content: Lists actionable steps: enable performance overlay, trace timeline events, prewarm shader caches, reduce jank with image caching, and monitor frame build/layout durations.

title: Implicit and Explicit Animations
summary: Blend implicit animations with AnimationController-driven sequences.
content: Explains AnimatedContainer, TweenAnimationBuilder, using AnimationController with TickerProviderStateMixin, choreographing staggered animations, and testing animations deterministically.
